Combat
Hit Points: 142 Initiative: -2 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 3 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +15/+15/+13 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +15/23
Armor Proficiency: Medium Shield Proficiency: Heavy Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (+13 d10 x2@19 R120'); Heavy Mace (+15 d8 x2@20); Longspear (+15 d8 x3@20); Unarmed (+15 d3 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: -2
Air Barrier: Conjured air shell gives +12 AC and foe 50% ranged miss chance for 20 hr/dy
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Requires no skill check to move full speed when blinded
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO, may deal lethal damage
Lightning Breath: 30' line inflicts 20d4 HP electricity (DC 23 Ref half) 5/dy
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Strike Back: May ready melee attack against melee foes that are out of range
Thunderburst: R100' 35' radius inflicts 20d6 HP bludgeoning and 1 hr deafness (DC 23 Fort half HP only) 4/dy
Touch Of Electricity: Touch inflicts 1d6+10 HP electricity 6/dy; wielded weapons inflict +1d6 HP electricity
Save: Fortitude: +9; Reflex: +4; Will: +14
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: -2
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +2
Spark Skin: Immune to electricity
Wasting: Immune to disease/Immune to sickened and nauseated
Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 9; O1: 7; O2: 7; O3: 7; O4: 6; O5: 6; O6: 6; O7: 6; O8: 6; O9: 6 Spell DC: O: 13
Spells:
Alter Winds (O1 Tran): Severe winds in 10' radius around touched increased or decreased 1 step for 20 hr
Clairaudience/Clairvoyance (Wind Sight3 Divi): 1200' Self gains choice of remote sight or hearing for 20 min
Cloak Of Winds (O3 Abju): R75' Foes of target suffer -4 ranged attacks; Tiny foes cannot touch target, are pushed 100', and suffer 3d6 HP nonlethal (DC 16 Fort neg) for 20 min
Control Weather (O7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Control Winds (O5 Tran): R800' Changes wind direction and speed 6 levels in 800'x40' cylinder for 200 min
Gaseous Form (Gaseous Form3 Tran): Touched becomes insubstantial (DR 10/magic, immune to poison, sneak attacks, and critical hits, unable to use spell components, fly 10') for 40 min
Greater Invisibility (Invisibility4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for 20 rd
Gust Of Wind (O2 Evoc): 60' 50 MPH gust affects medium or smaller creatures (DC 15 Fort neg) for 1 rd
Invisibility (Invisibility2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for 20 min or until attacks
River Of Wind (O4 Evoc): 5'x120' line inflicts 4d6 HP nonlethal and knocked prone (DC 17 Fort half HP only), then 2d6 HP nonlethal, pushed 20', and knocked prone (DC 17 Fort 1d6 HP only) for 19 rd
Sirocco (O6 Evoc): R300' 60' high, 20' radius inflicts 4d6+20 HP fire, fatigues, and knocks prone (DC 19 Fort half HP and neg knocked prone; flying creatures DC 15 Fly to avoid) for 20 rd
Whirlwind (O8 Evoc): R1200' Wind in 10' radius inflicts 3d6 HP, then 1d8 HP/rd for 20 rd (DC 21 Ref neg)
Winds Of Vengeance (O9 Evoc): Self gains 60' fly and immunity to wind, gas, and ranged weapons; inflicts on attackers 5d8 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (DC 22 Fort half HP only), for 20 min
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Final Revelation (Wind Mystery): May apply Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell to air and electricity spells w/out cost
Gaseous Form: May use Gaseous Form effects 20 min/dy; including others uses equal portion of daily time for each
Invisibility: May use Invisibility effects 20 min/dy or Greater Invisibility effects 20 rd/dy
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Vortex Spells: Crit w/spell staggers target for 1d4 rd
Wind Sight: May use Clairaudience/Clairvoyance effects on any unobstructed area 20 rd/dy
